title: Kakurenbo (Kakurenbo: Hide & Seek)
synopsis: Among the high rises of steel pipes, meshed power lines, and faded neon lights, exists a game that children dare to play within the ruins of the old city.
voices: ['Suzuki, Masami', 'Takeuchi, Junko', 'Kobayashi, Akiko', 'Ishibashi, Mika', 'Ueki, Makoto', 'Naitou, Ryou']
staff: [['Morita, Shuuhei', ['Producer', ' Director', ' Storyboard', ' Editing']], ['Sajiki, Daisuke', ['Background Art', ' Character Design']], ['Wayland, Tom', ['ADR Director']], ['Takeuchi, Hiroaki', ['Planning']]]
